master_base_prompt.description: LINE DRAWING – COLOURING PAGE (NO NUMBERS). This is the non-negotiable core. Everything else layers on top.
master_base_prompt.prompt:
Convert the uploaded photo into a children's colouring book page.

FACIAL LIKENESS (HIGHEST PRIORITY):
- Faces MUST be recognisable as the actual people in the photo
- Keep each person's real face shape, eye shape, nose, mouth
- Keep exact hairstyles - long hair stays long, short stays short
- A parent must recognise their children immediately
- Simplify for colouring but KEEP THE LIKENESS - not generic cartoon faces
- COUNT THE PEOPLE IN THE PHOTO AND DRAW EXACTLY THAT MANY - NO MORE, NO LESS.
- 1 person in photo = 1 person in output
- 2 people in photo = 2 people in output  
- 3 people in photo = 3 people in output
- Do NOT add sidekicks, companions, helpers, friends, or any extra human characters
- Fill the scene with themed OBJECTS instead of extra people

STYLE TARGET: Classic children's colouring book - simple, clean, easy to colour.

COMPOSITION RULES (CRITICAL):
- SIMPLE BACKGROUND ONLY: Plain sky with 2-3 simple clouds, simple flat ground
- NO busy backgrounds - no detailed trees, no forests, no complex scenery
- NO scattered small objects - no rocks, pebbles, grass blades, leaves on ground
- Maximum 8-12 main elements in the entire image
- Lots of WHITE SPACE between elements
- Every element well-spaced and clearly separated

LINE QUALITY (CRITICAL):
- ALL lines must connect perfectly - no gaps
- Thick, bold, smooth outlines
- Every shape fully enclosed for colouring
- No sketchy or broken lines
- No fine details or thin lines

SIMPLIFICATION:
- Clothing: Simple shapes, no complex patterns
- Objects: Bold simple outlines only
- Background: Minimal - sky, ground, maybe 2-3 simple elements

BANNED (DO NOT INCLUDE):
- Generic cartoon faces - faces must look like the real people
- Detailed foliage or trees with many leaves
- Ground texture of any kind
- Scattered debris, rocks, grass
- Complex patterns
- Tiny details

FRAME:
- All elements fully within frame
- Clear margins on all sides
- Centred composition

OUTPUT: Black lines on pure white background. No grey. No texture. No shading.

age_7_8.name: Ages 7-8
age_7_8.overlay:
Age level: 5-6 years
- Thick outlines
- Moderate detail allowed
- Clothing may include simple divisions (e.g. sleeves vs body)
- Background may include a few simple objects
- Avoid tiny or fiddly areas

age_9_10.name: Ages 9-10 (Older Kids)
age_9_10.overlay:
Age level: 7-8 years
- Slightly thinner outlines
- More detail allowed
- Clothing patterns may be simplified
- Background may include multiple elements
- Still no shading or texture

age_6.name: Age 6
age_6.overlay:
Age level: 6 years

DETAIL LEVEL:
- Medium outlines
- Detailed themed costumes (dresses with layers, capes, themed outfits)
- Accessories: crowns, wands, simple jewellery
- Faces: expressive with detail
- 25-30 colourable areas total
- 2-3 themed OBJECTS (not extra people) in scene

BACKGROUND:
- Full themed background
- Rainbow, clouds, stars
- Ground with simple grass
- Themed elements (fence, structures)

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere - not on dresses, not on skin, not on ground
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines
- This is a colouring book - children will add the colour

age_5.name: Age 5
age_5.overlay:
Age level: 5 years
- Medium-thick outlines
- Simple but recognisable figures
- Clothing: simple shapes, NO frills, NO layered skirts, NO intricate patterns
- Maximum 20-25 colourable areas
- MINIMAL background only - simple ground line, 1-2 simple clouds
- NO rainbow, NO detailed scenery, NO flowers, NO scattered stars
- Keep it simple and clean

age_7.name: Age 7
age_7.description: More detail within objects, fuller scenes
age_7.overlay:
Age level: 7 years

DETAIL LEVEL:
- More detail WITHIN each object (not more objects)
- Hair: show individual sections/strands to colour separately
- Clothing: add simple patterns (stripes, stars, small shapes as outlines)
- Faces: more expressive features
- 30-35 colourable areas total

BACKGROUND:
- Fuller themed background
- Ground, sky, clouds, 2-3 themed elements

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere - not on dresses, not on skin, not on ground
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines
- This is a colouring book - children will add the colour

age_8.name: Age 8
age_8.overlay:
Age level: 8 years

DETAIL LEVEL - MORE INTRICATE THAN AGE 7:
- Thinner outlines to allow more detail
- Clothing: MORE layers, ruffles, detailed trim, buttons, lace edges, bows
- Accessories: detailed crowns/tiaras, necklaces with gems, bracelets, detailed wands
- Add 3-4 themed OBJECTS (not extra people) (not just 1-2)
- 40-45 colourable areas total

BACKGROUND - RICHER SCENE:
- More detailed background elements
- Flowers with individual petals
- Detailed fencing or structures
- More clouds with definition
- Ground with some grass/flower details

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere - not on dresses, not on skin, not on ground
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines
- This is a colouring book - children will add the colour

age_9.overlay:
Age level: 9 years

90% OF THE PAGE SHOULD BE FILLED:
- MUST include a large themed landmark appropriate to the theme:
  * Fantasy/Unicorns → Castle with towers
  * Pirates → Pirate ship with sails
  * Dinosaurs → Volcano or jungle temple
  * Space → Rocket ship or space station
  * Underwater → Sunken ship or coral reef palace or giant shell
  * Superheroes → City skyline with buildings
- 2-3 themed creatures or animals alongside the people (NOT extra human characters)
- Scatter themed objects around the scene
- Only small gaps of empty space
- 50-65 colourable areas total

DETAILED BUT NOT OVERCROWDED:
- Clear outlines throughout
- Costumes with patterns and accessories
- Objects have internal detail

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines

age_10.overlay:
Age level: 10+ years

FILL ALL EMPTY SPACE WITH SMALL THEMED OBJECTS:
- Include big landmark appropriate to theme:
  * Fantasy/Unicorns → Castle with towers
  * Pirates → Pirate ship with sails  
  * Dinosaurs → Volcano or jungle temple
  * Space → Rocket ship or space station
  * Underwater → Sunken ship or coral reef palace or giant shell
  * Superheroes → City skyline with buildings
- Fill ALL empty space with small themed objects
- NO large empty areas - every gap has something to colour
- 70-90 colourable areas total

DENSE AND INTRICATE:
- Fine thin outlines throughout
- Elaborate costumes with patterns
- Every object has internal detail
- The page should feel FULL

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white
- NO grey anywhere
- NO shading of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines

none.name: No Theme (Photo Only)
none.description: Convert photo to colouring page without adding fantasy elements
none.overlay:
PHOTO TRACE MODE - IGNORE ALL PREVIOUS COLOURING BOOK INSTRUCTIONS:

Create a precise LINE SKETCH that traces the photograph exactly.

STYLE: Pencil sketch / line trace - NOT a colouring book page.

ACCURACY REQUIREMENTS:
- Trace the EXACT photograph - every detail, every element
- EXACT facial features - real faces, real expressions, real likeness
- EXACT background - mountains, trees, buildings, water - whatever is in the photo
- EXACT clothing, hair, poses - as photographed
- Keep realistic proportions throughout - do NOT cartoonise

LINE STYLE:
- Fine, precise pencil-sketch lines
- Detailed linework capturing textures and depth
- Include shading lines where needed for form
- Thin lines for details, slightly thicker for outlines

THIS IS A PHOTO TRACE:
- Someone looking at this should think "that's exactly my photo as a sketch"
- The faces must be recognisable as the specific people
- Background must match the actual location/scene
- Every element from the photo appears in the drawing

DO NOT simplify, cartoonise, or replace any elements. Trace the photo exactly.

- Place it clearly in the scene - NOT behind people, NOT overlapping with anything
- It must be FULLY VISIBLE with no part hidden or cut off
- The letter must NOT have a face, arms, or legs - just a simple letter shape
- Make it large enough that a child can clearly see what letter it is

Additional A objects to fill the scene:
apple, airplane, ant, alligator, anchor, arrow

IMPORTANT: Do NOT put the letter A printed on clothing - dress them in themed COSTUMES instead

NO TEXT - do not write any words or labels, only the letter A.

CRITICAL - BLACK AND WHITE ONLY:
- NO pink cheeks, NO blush, NO rosy cheeks
- NO colour anywhere - pure black lines on white only

adding_socks.name: Adding with Socks
adding_socks.overlay:
Create a simple maths worksheet style colouring page.

In the CENTER of the page, draw this addition equation using sock drawings:

🧦🧦🧦  +  🧦🧦  =  [?]

That means:
- Three sock drawings
- Then a plus sign
- Then two sock drawings
- Then an equals sign
- Then a question mark or empty box

ALL ON ONE LINE, horizontally across the page.

DO NOT DRAW:
- Any washing lines or clotheslines
- Any background scenery
- Any grass or ground
- Any clouds
- Any answer after the equals sign

ONLY DRAW:
- The socks (simple outline drawings)
- The + and = symbols
- A question mark or empty box for the answer
- Pure white background

adding_balloons.name: Adding with Balloons
adding_balloons.overlay:
Apply theme: Addition with Balloons

SCENE LAYOUT (CRITICAL):
- LEFT SIDE: A bunch of simple round balloons with strings (3-5 balloons)
- MIDDLE: A large clear PLUS symbol (+)
- RIGHT SIDE: Another bunch of balloons with strings (2-4 balloons)
- Then a large clear EQUALS symbol (=)
- FAR RIGHT: An empty cloud or box shape (space for child to draw the answer)

CRITICAL RULES:
- NO numbers anywhere on the page - ONLY balloons and + = symbols
- Simple round balloons, each clearly separate
- Each balloon easy to count
- Make balloons large and easy to colour

DO NOT INCLUDE:
- Any people or characters
- Any numbers or digits
- Any text or labels

find_the.name: Find The...
find_the.description: Hidden object game - finds objects in their natural setting
find_the.overlay:
A "find and seek" colouring page.

Take whatever object/animal was requested and:

1. Create an appropriate NATURAL HABITAT scene for that thing:
   - Rabbit → field with grass, bushes, burrows
   - Football → football pitch with goals, lines
   - Fish → underwater scene with seaweed, coral
   - Dog → park with trees, benches, paths
   - Car → street scene with buildings, roads
   - Bird → forest with trees, branches, nests

2. Hide 8-12 of that object/animal throughout the scene:
   - Some fully visible
   - Some peeking out from behind things
   - Some partially hidden
   - Some small in background

DO NOT INCLUDE:
- Any numbers
- Any text or words
- Any people

Just the scene and the hidden objects to find.

master_text_prompt.prompt:
Create a children's colouring book page.

⚠️ ABSOLUTE REQUIREMENT - 100% BLACK AND WHITE:
- ONLY black lines on pure white background
- NO grey anywhere - not even light grey
- NO shading of any kind
- NO gradients
- NO colour of any kind
- NO dots, NO speckles, NO texture, NO noise
- Every single area must be PURE WHITE inside black outlines
- The background must be PURE WHITE
- This is a colouring book - children will add the colour

LINE QUALITY:
- Medium-thickness black outlines throughout
- ALL lines must connect perfectly - no gaps
- All shapes fully enclosed for colouring
- Clean, smooth lines - no sketchy or broken lines

COMPOSITION:
- All elements must be FULLY VISIBLE - nothing cut off at edges
- No title text or banners unless specified

OUTPUT: Clean black outlines on pure white. No grey. No texture. No shading. No colour.
